description: Police want to find the driver of a blue car involved, which failed to stop, said a spokesperson.
title: Appeal after pedestrian injured in hit-and-run
title_page: Guildford: Appeal after pedestrian injured in hit-and-run crash - BBC News
maintext:
Police are appealing for witnesses after a pedestrian was injured in a hit-and-run crash.
Emergency services were called to London Road in Burpham, near Guildford, at about 12:00 GMT on 21 February.
A pedestrian required medical treatment for serious injuries, Surrey Police said.
Police are particularly keen to trace the driver of a blue car involved in the crash, which failed to stop at the scene, a spokesperson said.
